title: Bug 8142 - No scoped type hierarchy on binary projects
OB: When I hit F4 on a binary project selection (e.g. org.apache.ant), I get: 'No declaration of selected members in the chosen hierarchy of 'org.apache.ant'.
EB: I would expect to see the class hierarchies of the internal jars.
SR: To reproduce the issue, open a binary project and press F4 on a selection, such as org.apache.ant.
